attachments.text: Related to: #12277 Provides a way to do configuration for modules that allows for better control on the plugin side (us) but allows simple usage by users (and we can provide backwards compatibility...

root.text:
```v:lua.lsp.api.get_definitions(function(responses)
  — 全 LS のレスポンスが { client_id, response } 形式で配列で手に入る
end)```
こんな感じだともにょらないのかしらとか考えています。
